attributes.action: force house builders to fit at least 4 solar panels in the roof of every new home built after 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that if the government put rules in place for all new houses to have solar panals and perhaps triple glazing and extra insulation, these small changes over many years would save huge amounts of power.
They could even subsidise other households to get it done, the extra power generated during the day when no one is home could be used towards local services or industry.
Please sign up and tell your friends and family to do the same, From tiny acorns!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
